name: Skies and Monsters
description:
This is my 2D Platformer game project named Skies and Monsters

The changes that I have made are:

1) Changed the whole layout/setting of the game but with the same characters and other stuff

2) I added a second level + changed the first level

3) Different UI

4) Made a coin collectible

I hope you enjoy it!

Assets that were used:

 For the background/visuals https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/2d/environments/free-platform-game-assets-...

Created by: Hatoon Alhudaib
